origins: Ethnically diverse due to urban migration; Ebrié are indigenous.
regions: [{'name': 'Abidjan', 'notes': 'Economic capital with heavy internal migration and language mixing.'}]

origins: Capital of Baoulé territory; strong Akan cultural heritage.
regions: [{'name': 'Yamoussoukro', 'notes': 'Autonomous district, historic center of Baoulé people.'}]

origins: Krou-speaking peoples indigenous to the coastal southwest.
regions: [{'name': 'San-Pédro', 'notes': 'Port region with Kroumen majority.'}, {'name': 'Gbôklé', 'notes': 'Includes Godié and Avikam speakers.'}, {'name': 'Nawa', 'notes': 'Bété populations, especially in Soubré area.'}]

origins: Akan migration for Agni; native Gur speakers in northeast.
regions: [{'name': 'Indénié-Djuablin', 'notes': 'Agni-speaking majority, part of Akan group.'}, {'name': 'Sud-Comoé', 'notes': 'Agni Sanwi, cultural ties to Ashanti kingdom.'}]

origins: Mande and Senufo historical homelands; less migration.
Bété are Krou; Baoulé migrated from the east.
regions: [{'name': 'Gôh', 'notes': 'Bété majority.'}, {'name': 'Lôh-Djiboua', 'notes': 'Bété and Dida cohabitation; Baoulé settlements.'}]
[{'name': 'Agnéby-Tiassa', 'notes': 'Adjoukrou and Abé.'}, {'name': 'Grands-Ponts', 'notes': 'Alladian and Avikam speakers.'}, {'name': 'La Mé', 'notes': 'Ebrié center.'}]

origins: Krou-speaking forest peoples; diverse languages and isolated groups.
regions: [{'name': 'Cavally', 'notes': 'Guéré speakers.'}, {'name': 'Guémon', 'notes': 'Yacouba and Dan.'}, {'name': 'Tonkpi', 'notes': 'Major Dan-speaking area (Man city).'}]

origins: Historical core of Senufo and Mandé kingdoms.
regions: [{'name': 'Bagoué', 'notes': 'Senufo-speaking zone.'}, {'name': 'Poro', 'notes': 'Korhogo, cultural capital of Senufo.'}, {'name': 'Tchologo', 'notes': 'Tagbana and Malinké overlap.'}]

origins: Akan presence with historical trade centers.
regions: [{'name': 'Gbêkê', 'notes': 'Bouaké city, Baoulé hub.'}, {'name': 'Hambol', 'notes': 'Mixed Baoulé and other Akan.'}]

origins: Mande and Senufo peoples; inland trade routes.
Northeast Gur-speaking peoples; limited Akan presence.
regions: [{'name': 'Bounkani', 'notes': 'Koulango and Lobi core area.'}, {'name': 'Gontougo', 'notes': 'Cultural interface with Akan Agni.'}]
